title: Stupid Patch
body: Hi there, after the patch yesterday, me and other summoners computers kept randomly dcing from games. It isnt an internet problem as they internet never went out. I was playing with my mates and it happened to us all multiple times. As i result of this, i now have a leaverbuster 20min queue ban. Anyone else experience this ridiculous problem

replies.body: Narh they probz won't help becuase then they would have to admit it's the new clients fault that they forced on everyone when it wasn't ready. sorry to hear about leave buster :(
